short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JLM Weather: current weather in Jerusalem, Israel, including temperature, rain, humidity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The JLM Weather extension provides a popup with the current temperature, chance of rain and humidity in Jerusalem, Israel.
Click on the extension button and you'll be able to see quickly how to dress for the local weather!
